cause.description:
Since 1979, the Children's Shelter of Cebu has been providing homes for orphaned, abandoned and surrendered children in the Philippines.
Every child deserves a family! http://www.cscshelter.org/
1. Every child deserves a family!
cause.mission: Provide homes for orphaned, abandoned and surrendered children in the Philippines.
cause.name: Children's Shelter of Cebu
